headline.main: Santorum Buys TV Advertising in South Carolina

docs.snippet: A quick shift in focus to South Carolina for Rick Santorum....
docs.abstract: A quick shift in focus to South Carolina for Rick Santorum.
docs.lead_paragraph: MANCHESTER, N.H. - The outcome of the New Hampshire primary won't be known until Tuesday evening, but Rick Santorum is already setting his sights on South Carolina, where he will buy significant chunks of advertising time next week.

headline.main: Gary Bauer Says He Will Endorse Santorum

docs.snippet: The social conservative leader will endorse Rick Santorum for president  during a visit to South Carolina on Sunday....

headline.main: Gary Bauer Says He Will Endorse Santorum

docs.snippet: The social conservative leader will endorse Rick Santorum for president during a visit to South Carolina on Sunday....
docs.abstract: The social conservative leader will endorse Rick Santorum for president during a visit to South Carolina on Sunday.
docs.lead_paragraph: MANCHESTER, N.H. - Gary Bauer, a social conservative leader and former Republican presidential hopeful, said that he will endorse Rick Santorum's bid for the party's presidential nomination during a visit to South Carolina on Sunday.

headline.main: Patrick Buchanan's Future at MSNBC Is Murky, Network's Chief Says

docs.snippet: The conservative commentator has not been on air since October. At first it was because of a book tour; now the network's president says some of what Mr. Buchanan wrote in the book "Suicide of a Superpower" is at issue....
docs.abstract: The conservative commentator has not been on air since October. At first it was because of a book tour; now the network's president says some of what Mr. Buchanan wrote in the book "Suicide of a Superpower" is at issue.

headline.main: Patrick Buchanan's Future at MSNBC Is Murky, Network's Chief Says

docs.snippet: The conservative commentator has not been on air since October. At first it was because of a book tour; now the network's president says some of what Mr. Buchanan wrote in the book "Suicide of a Superpower" is at issue....
docs.abstract: The conservative commentator has not been on air since October. At first it was because of a book tour; now the network's president says some of what Mr. Buchanan wrote in the book "Suicide of a Superpower" is at issue.
docs.lead_paragraph: PASADENA, Calif. - The days of Patrick J. Buchanan as a commentator on the news channel MSNBC may be over.

docs.snippet: Readers comment on my column about the perils of toxic stress and the importance of early-childhood interventions....
docs.abstract: Readers comment on my column about the perils of toxic stress and the importance of early-childhood interventions.

docs.snippet: Readers comment on my column about the perils of toxic stress and the importance of early-childhood interventions....
docs.abstract: Readers comment on my column about the perils of toxic stress and the importance of early-childhood interventions.
docs.lead_paragraph: My Sunday column looks at new evidence of the importance of early childhood and pregnancy on life outcomes. I've been increasingly impressed by the research that suggests that biological mechanisms -- such as the way cortisol floods a small child under stress, disrupting brain development -- appear to lay the groundwork for social disadvantage later. But I was looking for a peg to write about this, and then the American Academy of Pediatrics provided it by issuing a landmark policy statement endorsing this new science of toxic stress.
